thread.title: Learn more about Fallout 4's Agility system in this new trailer - Gaming
thread.title_full: Learn more about Fallout 4's Agility system in this new trailer - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Albaraa Fahmy
title: Learn more about Fallout 4's Agility system in this new trailer - Gaming
text: If you want to learn more about Fallout 4's Agility system, the latest trailer for the game is just for you.According to the new promo, the ability is the player's key to tactical survival throughout the wasteland in Bethesda's upcoming role-playing title.As with other in-game abilities, Agility should help ensure the survival of your fellow citizens - so be sure to do your part by sharing the video with other Fallout fans.Set in a post-apocalyptic Boston, Fallout 4 is the first new entry in the role-playing series since 2010's New Vegas.Players will be able to build structures and settlements and use in-game items to create defences. Towns can be powered with electricity, which can also be used to power other creations. Â© Bethesda Softworks Fallout 4 is set to release worldwide on November 10 for Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC.Bethesda recently announced its $30 season pass. The first batch of post-release content is likely to drop in the early stages of 2016.Everything you need to know about Fallout 4, including release date, trailers and pre-ordersCheck out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
